Detailed Description

IPMP control information part.

Part of the structure containing IPMP control information classes.

Definition at line 29 of file IIPMPControlInfoPart.h.

virtual const bool& DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IIPMPControlInfoPart::GetCurrentNextIndicator (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Get indicator whether the control information is currently applicable.

If indicator is true, the control information is currently applicable, if not it is the next control information to become applicable.

Returns:
Boolean indicating current applicability.
